messages.1000086315:
#wTransform into a #yDark Avenger#w. Jump and shoot dozens of fire blades to the ground, then descend as you spin and attack.
Keep pressing the #yRegular Attack Button#w after the first hit to keep hitting. The damage of the final hit will increase depending on how long you charge the skill.

#yCan also be used in the air.
Total Projectiles: {0}
Physical Damage per Projectile: {1}% + {2} (3 Hits)

messages.1000086307:
#v(Nightmare Skill)
#wSlash as you move forward, then deal two more #yadditional hits.

#y(1st Additional Hit)
Regular Attack Button: #wSlash as you move forward.
#ySpecial Attack Button: #wSlash as you spin in place.

#y(2nd Additional Hit)
Regular Attack: #wSlash and shove enemies back.
#ySpecial Attack Button: #wHit enemies and launch them into the air.

#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}
messages.1000086308:
#v(Nightmare Skill)
#wPush a target with your shoulder as you dash instantly and deal an #yadditional hit#w.

#yRegular Attack Button: #wStab while dashing.
#ySpecial Attack Button: #wHit enemies and launch them into the air.

#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}
messages.1000086055:

#wJump in place and shoot multiple big air blades. Press the #yRegular Attack Button#w in the air to activate the skill.

messages.1000086309:
#wDraw your sword and take a stance.

#yRegular Attack Button: #wShoot a fast, explosive air blade.
#y(Backward Key) + Regular Attack Button: #wShoot a slow air blade that will penetrate through an enemy and deal {0}% Damage.
#yForward Key: #wDash quickly.
#ySpecial Attack Button: #wCancel the stance, detonate the slow air blade, and deal #y{1}x#w Damage.

#yStance Duration: {2} sec
#yPhysical Damage per {3} air blade(s): {4}% + {5}
Final Hit's Physical Damage: {6}% + {7}
messages.1000090969:
#v(Nightmare Skill)
#wInfuse your weapon's fire energy into the earth to disrupt the local gravity field and launch enemies into the air. Every attack will deal additional damage to the enemies who still have active Super Armor.

#yCreate Fury x{0} (Duration: {1} sec)

#yEvery attack deals {2}% additional damage to resisting enemies.
#yPhysical Damage: {3}% + {4}

#yDamage taken while casting: -{5}%

messages.1000086060:
#v(Nightmare Skill)
#wCharge your weapon with energy, then deal a powerful upward blow to send a shockwave forward and launch enemies into the air. Press the #yJump#w while using a skill on the ground to activate it.

#yCan be used while using a skill

#wPerform multiple twirl-thrusts in a row to draw nearby enemies toward you, then create a whirl of fire to launch enemies into the air. Decreases the #yFire Resistance#w of enemies hit by the whirl.

#ySpecial Attack Button: #wEnd the attack with a whirl of fire.
